description: A mobile app to generate consistent randomized passwords. Used Ionic, Angular.JS.

An NPM module to facilitate building simple Twitter bots. Used Node.JS, Twitter API, Gulp, Mocha, Chai.

GitHub: https://github.com/lexm/twitter-bot
A single-page website to locate nearby pet shelters. GitHub: https://github.com/lexm/Catpanion

A timed math game where every correct answer earns you a kitty. A Cheezburger fave.

Meow.
